Data.text_description:
The probability of amount of exercise done by a person being high (A=1) is 0.3009. 
For those with amount of exercise done by a person being low (A=0), the probability of physical fitness level of a person being fit (B=1) is 0.7826. 
For those with amount of exercise done by a person being high (A=1), the probability of physical fitness level of a person being fit (B=1) is 0.9478. 
For those with physical fitness level of a person being unfit (B=0), the probability of risk of developing a health condition being high (C=1) is 0.6775. 
For those with physical fitness level of a person being fit (B=1), the probability of risk of developing a health condition being high (C=1) is 0.2199. 
For those with risk of developing a health condition being low (C=0), the probability of actual development of the health condition being improving (D=1) is 0.5554. 
For those with risk of developing a health condition being high (C=1), the probability of actual development of the health condition being improving (D=1) is 0.4343.
